404.quotes: This page got tangled in the yarn
Who let the cat play with the ball?!
Looks like we dropped a stitch
Even Ariadne cannot help us here
Oops, we ran out of yarn here
The fabric of this page came undone
Dang it! Who broke the loom again?
You've escaped the fabric of reality
Whoops! We might need to roll things back
'Can you knot?' 'I cannot.' 'So you can knot!'
